Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/ Lotus
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Central, Grand, Laramie and North Avenue: due to, fire department activity near North Avenue/Lotus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect mt trip?

 

#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Central, Grand, Laramie, North Avenue and over regular route, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Lotus.

Allow extra travel time.
